title: Tonatiuh++ Development Blog
description: Latest developments in solar ray tracing and CST optimization research

items.content_html:
This blog documents the ongoing development and enhancement of Tonatiuh++, an advanced solar ray tracing software for analyzing the optical behaviour of concentrating solar power systems.

About Tonatiuh++â€‹

Tonatiuh++ is an enhanced version of the Tonatiuh ray tracer with improvements in ray tracing algorithms, performance, and cross-platform support.

More content coming soon!
items.title: Welcome to the Tonatiuh++ Development Blog
items.summary: Introduction to the Tonatiuh++ Development Blog - documenting advances in this solar ray tracing software for concentrating solar thermal systems
